backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the Decade Diary backend with user profile management, couples pairing, vision board entries, and daily planner entries, all protected by role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (Dashboard, Vision Board, Daily Planner, Couples UI) to their source files, components, and test requirement IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference for the project's frontend file structure and purpose.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Decade Diary React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component setting up TanStack Router with Dashboard, VisionBoard, DailyPlanner, and CoupleSettings routes, plus a sticky layout, profile setup modal, couple mode badge, and auth controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP actor using the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom React hook and context provider wrapping DFINITY's AuthClient to expose Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state throughout the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profiles, daily quotes, vision board entries, daily planner entries, and couple management, using TanStack Query's useQuery and useMutation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, configures Tailwind CSS, and defines CSS custom properties for a warm cream/amber light theme and a dark theme, plus reusable component utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CoupleSettings.tsx: Page component for managing couple connections, allowing users to copy their principal ID, connect with a partner by entering their principal, and view or disconnect an existing couple relationship.
frontend/src/pages/DailyPlanner.tsx: Page component for a per-day planner with schedule items, top tasks, mood tracking, water intake, gratitude entries, and a journal, supporting navigation between dates and saving entries to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying a daily inspirational quote banner, vision board progress summaries, and daily planner stats using data fetched from multiple query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/VisionBoard.tsx: Page component for managing a vision board of categorized long-term goals, supporting adding goals via a modal, updating progress with a slider, and deleting entries with a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens (warm palette), shadows, border radii, and animation keyframes, using typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest for Decade Diary describing completed Phase 1 features (Home Dashboard, 10-Year Vision Board, Daily Planner, Couples Collaboration), architectural notes, required images, and versioning metadata.
